hadiths.text: Narrated Awf ibn Malik al-Ashja'i': The Prophet (ﷺ) said: I and a woman whose cheeks have become black shall on the Day of Resurrection be like these two (pointing to the middle and forefinger), i.e. a woman of rank and beauty who has been bereft of her husband and devotes herself to her fatherless children till they go their separate ways or die

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ مَنْ عَالَ يَتَامَى
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of one who takes care of an orphan
